body:
I get the error:

Installing gtkplus
==> Using cached archive: /dat/usr/e157618/spack/var/spack/cache/gtkplus/gtkplus-2.24.31.tar.xz
==> Staging archive: /dat/usr/e157618/spack/var/spack/stage/gtkplus-2.24.31-gzzy7kuo4y35wkxrcv36tcryzt3g74f6/gtk+-2.24.31.tar.xz
==> Created stage in /dat/usr/e157618/spack/var/spack/stage/gtkplus-2.24.31-gzzy7kuo4y35wkxrcv36tcryzt3g74f6
==> Applied patch no-demos.patch
==> Ran patch() for gtkplus
==> Building gtkplus [AutotoolsPackage]
==> Executing phase: 'autoreconf'
==> Executing phase: 'configure'
==> Error: ProcessError: Command exited with status 1:
    '/dat/usr/e157618/spack/var/spack/stage/gtkplus-2.24.31-gzzy7kuo4y35wkxrcv36tcryzt3g74f6/gtk+-2.24.31/configure' '--prefix=/dat/usr/e157618/spack/opt/spack/linux-rhel6-x86_64/gcc-4.4.7/gtkplus-2.24.31-gzzy7kuo4y35wkxrcv36tcryzt3g74f6'
See build log for details:
  /tmp/e157618/spack-stage/spack-stage-4ijFaY/gtk+-2.24.31/spack-build.out

title: Error installing gtkplus
